title: Mini-Ep 223: The Art of Self
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 223: The Art of Self
itunes:subtitle: Kate resolves to help everyone get vaccinated and Doree considers becoming a runner again. Then, they hear from listeners about how to find “your people” when moving away from home for the first time, how often to wash towels and blankets, and to chat ...
description:
Kate resolves to help everyone get vaccinated and Doree considers becoming a runner again. Then, they hear from listeners about how to find “your people” when moving away from home for the first time, how often to wash towels and blankets, and to chat about the sexy and sumptuous show with lobsters.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
